title: Situation-Based Training Course for Strengthening Engineering Ethics Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental engineering concepts and management experience
context.additional_context: Environment allowing shared VR device usage, requiring optimization of mobile learning materials

learning_goals: Learners can apply appropriate decision-making frameworks with 80% accuracy in ethical dilemma situations.
Learners can identify five major ethical issues (conflict, safety, environment, etc.) that may arise in engineering project management and establish response measures.
Learners can demonstrate communication skills with 90% engagement while collaborating with team members to resolve ethical issues through VR simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
